# Housekeeping   
The purpose of this file is to create the lists for Experiment 1
*Color file here: http://www.stat.columbia.edu/~tzheng/files/Rcolor.pdf*   

## Knitting    
```{r Knitting, include=F}

library(knitr)

opts_chunk$set(
  dev = 'pdf',
  comment = "", 
  echo = FALSE, 
  warning = TRUE, 
  message = TRUE,
  cache = FALSE, 
  size = "small",
  tidy.opts = list(width.cutoff = 200),
  fig.width = 8, 
  fig.height = 4.5, 
  fig.align = "center")

def.chunk.hook  <- knitr::knit_hooks$get("chunk")

knitr::knit_hooks$set(
  chunk = function(x, options) {
  x <- def.chunk.hook(x, options)
    ifelse(
      options$size != "normalsize", 
      paste0(
        "\n \\", 
        options$size,
        "\n\n", 
        x, 
        "\n\n \\normalsize"), 
        x)
})

color_block = function(color) {
    function(x, options)        sprintf('\\color{%s}\\begin{verbatim}%s\\end{verbatim}\\color{black}', color, x)
}
knitr::knit_hooks$set(error = color_block('red'))
knitr::knit_hooks$set(warning = color_block('orange'))
```

# Example Only: 08.19 
```{r List}

###

tibble(
  AttendedCategory = c("sh", "s"),
  AttendedWord = c("ambition", "pregnancy"),
  UnattendedCategory = c("s", "sh"),
  UnattendedWord = c("parasite", "initial")
  ) %>% 
  
crossing(
  Assignment_TalkerToAccent = c(
    "attended: sh-biased", 
    "attended: s-biased"
    ),
  Assignment_TalkerToGender = c(
    "attended: female", 
    "attended: male"
    ),
  Assignment_TalkerToEar = c(
    "attended: left", 
    "attended: right"
    )) %>%
 
mutate(
  filename = paste(
    case_when(
      Assignment_TalkerToAccent == "attended: sh-biased" & AttendedCategory == "sh" ~ paste0("a", AttendedWord),
      Assignment_TalkerToAccent == "attended: s-biased" & AttendedCategory == "s" ~ paste0("a", AttendedWord),
      T ~ AttendedWord),
    case_when(
      Assignment_TalkerToGender == "attended: female" ~ "-female",
      T ~ "-male")
    )) %>% 
  
View()
```
